function handlePlayButtonClick(){if(typeof episodes!=='undefined'){if(!document.title.startsWith("Watch ")){document.title="Watch "+document.title} initializeEpisodes();const dropdown=document.querySelector('.e-bookmark .dropdown');const itemAdd=document.querySelector('.item-add');if(dropdown&&itemAdd){while(dropdown.firstChild){itemAdd.appendChild(dropdown.firstChild)}} document.querySelector('.watch-wrap')?.classList.remove('d-none');document.querySelector('.comments')?.classList.remove('d-none');document.querySelector('.anime-servers')?.classList.remove('d-none');document.querySelector('.btn-play')?.classList.add('d-none');document.querySelector('.character')?.classList.add('d-none');document.querySelector('.content-split')?.classList.add('in-watch');document.querySelector('#main_area')?.classList.add('anime-single','anime-watch');const posterSplit=document.querySelector('.poster-split');if(posterSplit){posterSplit.remove()}}} if(typeof episodes==='undefined'||!Array.isArray(episodes)||episodes.length===0){document.querySelectorAll('.btn-play, .stick-play').forEach(button=>button.remove())}else{episodes.forEach(episode=>{episode.servers.forEach(server=>{if(server.value.includes('/p/file.html')){server.value+=`&${episode.cover || config.eInfo.cover}`}})});document.querySelectorAll('.btn-play, .stick-play').forEach(button=>{button.addEventListener('click',event=>{event.preventDefault();window.scrollTo({top:0,behavior:'smooth'});handlePlayButtonClick()})});if(epParam!==null){document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",function(){handlePlayButtonClick()})}} document.querySelectorAll('.item-light').forEach(function(item){item.addEventListener('click',function(event){event.stopPropagation();item.classList.toggle('active');if(document.querySelector('.item-light.active')){document.querySelector('.blur-mask').classList.add('play')}else{document.querySelector('.blur-mask').classList.remove('play')} if(item.classList.contains('active')){document.getElementById('header').style.zIndex=4;document.getElementById('watch-target').style.zIndex='12'}else{document.getElementById('header').style.zIndex='';document.getElementById('watch-target').style.zIndex=''}})});document.addEventListener('click',function(event){if(!document.getElementById('watch-target').contains(event.target)&&!event.target.classList.contains('item-light')){document.querySelectorAll('.item-light').forEach(function(item){item.classList.remove('active')});document.querySelector('.blur-mask').classList.remove('play');document.getElementById('header').style.zIndex='';document.getElementById('watch-target').style.zIndex=''}}) const results={};let loadedCount=0;function normalizeTitle(str){return str.toLowerCase().replace(/[^\p{L}\p{N}]+/gu,' ').trim()} function getPostFactory(expectedTitle){const normalizedExpected=normalizeTitle(expectedTitle);return function(e){let entry=script1.getFeed(e);let matched=entry.find(item=>normalizeTitle(item.title)===normalizedExpected);results[expectedTitle]=matched||null;loadedCount++;if(loadedCount>=seasonList.length){let html='<h2 class="heading-sm text-white mb-3">Season</h2><div class="ani-season-grid">';seasonList.forEach(item=>{let data=results[item.title];if(data){const currentUrl=window.location.origin+window.location.pathname;const isActive=currentUrl===data.link.split('?')[0]?' active':'';html+=`<a href="${data.link}" class="season-inner${isActive}"><div class="season-banner" style="background-image: url(${data.image})"></div><span>${item.season}</span></a>`}});document.getElementById('season').innerHTML=html}}} seasonList.forEach(item=>{let query=encodeURIComponent(item.title);let url=`/feeds/posts/default?alt=json-in-script&q=${query}&max-results=10`;script1.xhr('GET',url,getPostFactory(item.title))}) //

/**/ var root = document.documentElement; var button = document.querySelector('.nsfw');
if (localStorage.getItem('isSafe') === '1') { root.classList.add('sfw'); button.classList.add('on'); }
button.addEventListener('click', () => { root.classList.toggle('sfw'); button.classList.toggle('on');
if (root.classList.contains('sfw')) { localStorage.setItem('isSafe', '1'); } else { localStorage.removeItem('isSafe'); } });
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',function(){const modeBtn=document.querySelector('.mode-hd');const observer=new MutationObserver(mutations=>{mutations.forEach(mutation=>{mutation.addedNodes.forEach(node=>{if(node.tagName==='IMG'){processImage(node)}else if(node.querySelectorAll){node.querySelectorAll('img').forEach(processImage)}})})});observer.observe(document.body,{childList:!0,subtree:!0});document.querySelectorAll('.anime-thumbnail-img').forEach(processImage);const isHD=localStorage.getItem('hdMode')==='on';if(isHD){modeBtn?.classList.add('on')} modeBtn?.addEventListener('click',function(){this.classList.toggle('on');const isNowHD=this.classList.contains('on');localStorage.setItem('hdMode',isNowHD?'on':'off');document.querySelectorAll('.anime-thumbnail-img').forEach(processImage)});function processImage(img){const src=img.getAttribute('src');if(!src||!src.includes('blogger.googleusercontent.com'))return;if(!img.dataset.srcOriginal){img.dataset.srcOriginal=src} const isHD=localStorage.getItem('hdMode')==='on';if(isHD){const newSrc=src.replace(/\/(s\d+|w\d+(-h\d+)?(?:-[a-z0-9\-]+)*)\//,'/s1600/');if(img.src!==newSrc)img.setAttribute('src',newSrc);}else{const original=img.dataset.srcOriginal;if(original&&img.src!==original)img.setAttribute('src',original);}}}) /**/
